ActiveRecallCount.description: The number of active recalls for parts related to the vehicle.

ActiveServiceContractCount.description: The number of active service contracts for the vehicle.

ActiveSubscriptionCount.description: The number of active subscriptions for the vehicle.

ActiveWarrantyCount.description: The number of active warranties for the vehicle.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the vehicle. This field is unique within your organization.

AverageMarketValue.description: The average market value of the vehicle.

ChassisNumber.description: The chassis number that is unique to the vehicle.

Classification.description: Auto-populated based on the vehicle classification specified on the related vehicle definition.

ConditionType.description: Specifies the current status of the vehicle.

CurrentOwnerId.description: The current owner of the vehicle.

CylinderCount.description: The number of cylinders in the engine of the vehicle.

DrivetrainSystem.description: Auto-populated based on the drivetrain system specified on the related vehicle definition.

EngineName.description: Auto-populated based on the engine name specified on the related vehicle definition.

EngineNumber.description: The engine number of the vehicle.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of the vehicle.

FrontRimSize.description: The rim size of the front wheel of the vehicle.

FrontTireSize.description: The size of the front tire of the vehicle.

FuelSource.description: Auto-populated based on the fuel source specified on the related vehicle definition.

GearBoxType.description: The gear box type for the vehicle.

HeadUnitName.description: The head unit of the vehicle.

HeadUnitSecurityCode.description: The anti-theft code or security code that unlocks the head unit of a car. If the factory car stereo is stolen from the vehicle, the head unit becomes inoperable without this code.

HighestMarketValue.description: The highest market value of the vehicle.

IgnitionKeyCode.description: The unique code associated with a vehicle's ignition key that is useful in case it's stolen or replaced.

InteriorColor.description: The interior color of the vehicle.

IsConnectedServiceActive.description: Indicates whether connected services for a vehicle are active (true) or not (false).

IsRecallOpen.description: Indicate whether a recall is required for the vehicle.

IsTelematicsServiceActive.description: Indicates whether the vehicle has any subscription to Telematics Services or not. Telematics services collect key performance data related to a vehicle.

LastOdometerReading.description: The last odometer reading that was recorded for the vehicle.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastServiceDate.description: The date when the vehicle was last serviced.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LatestResidualValue.description: The date when the residual value is calculated.

LatestResidualValueDate.description: The current location of the vehicle.

Location.description: The city where the vehicle is located.

LocationCity.description: The country where the vehicle is located.

LocationCountry.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the vehicle’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

LocationGeocodeAccuracy.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the vehicle. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationLatitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the vehicle. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

LocationLongitude.description: The postal code where the vehicle is located.

LocationPostalCode.description: The state where the vehicle is located.

LocationState.description: The street where the vehicle is located.

LocationStreet.description: The lowest market value of the vehicle.

LowestMarketValue.description: Auto-populated based on the make name on the product record related to the vehicle definition.

MakeName.description: The manufacturing date of the vehicle.

ManufacturedDate.description: The date until which the factory warranty is applicable for the vehicle.

ManufacturerWarrantyEndDate.description: The date from which the factory warranty is applicable for the vehicle.

ManufacturerWarrantyStartDt.description: The manufacturing batch number of the vehicle.

ManufacturingBatchNumber.description: The name of the manufacturing plant for the vehicle.

ManufacturingPlantName.description: The market price of the vehicle.

MarketPrice.description: The date when the market price is calculated.

MarketPriceDate.description: The source for the market price of the vehicle.

MarketPriceSource.description: Auto-populated based on the model name on the product record related to the vehicle definition.

ModelName.description: Auto-populated based on the model year on the product record related to the vehicle definition.

Name.description: The most recent date when the odometer reading was taken.

OdometerReadingDate.description: The odometer reading UOM associated with the vehicle.

OdometerReadingUomId.description: Specifies the current status of the odometer in the vehicle. Use this field because the field OdometerStatus will be deprecated soon.

OdometerState.description: Specifies the condition of the odometer such as new, tampered, or replaced.

OdometerStatus.description: The rim size of the rear wheel of the vehicle.

RearRimSize.description: The size of the rear tire of the vehicle.

RearTireSize.description: Specifies the state code associated with this registration number.

RegistrationRegionCode.description: The date until which the registration of the vehicle is valid.

RegistrationValidityDate.description: The unique identifier of the vehicle in the external system.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The external system from where this record was imported.

Status.description: The steering type of the vehicle.

SteeringType.description: The unique code assigned to a vehicle at the dealership to keep track of the inventory.

StockCode.description: Auto-populated based on the trim level on the product record related to the vehicle definition.

TrimLevel.description: The color of the upholstery of the vehicle.

UpholsteryColor.description: The type of upholstery material of the vehicle.

UpholsteryType.description: The vehicle specification associated with the vehicle.

VehicleDefinitionId.description: The number that uniquely identifies the vehicle. This field is unique within your organization.

VehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The registration number issued for the vehicle.
